welcome_message_body: Welcome to Santa Clarita, where charming small-town vibes meet big-city amenities. Known for its beautiful landscapes, family-friendly attractions, and vibrant arts scene, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Gyromania
restaurants.description: Gyromania is a greek restaurant located in Santa Clarita.
restaurants.address: 20655 Soledad Canyon Rd, Santa Clarita, CA 91351

restaurants.name: Rattler's Bar B Que
restaurants.description: Rattler's Bar B Que is a bbq joint located in Santa Clarita.
restaurants.address: 26495 Golden Valley Rd (at Centre Pointe Pkwy), Santa Clarita, CA 91350

restaurants.name: Las Delicias
restaurants.description: Las Delicias is a mexican restaurant located in Santa Clarita.
restaurants.address: 26515 Golden Valley Rd, Santa Clarita, CA 91350

restaurants.name: Maria Bonita Mexican Restaurant
restaurants.description: Maria Bonita Mexican Restaurant is a mexican restaurant located in Canyon Country.
restaurants.address: 20655 Soledad Canyon Rd (at Ruether Ave.), Canyon Country, CA 91351

restaurants.name: China Wok
restaurants.description: China Wok is a chinese restaurant located in Canyon Country.
restaurants.address: 20655 Soledad Canyon Rd #38, Canyon Country, CA 91351

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is the main terminal for commercial airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bob Hope Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bob Hope Airport, primarily serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Ynez Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport houses the airport's administrative offices, as well as various aviation service providers.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Santa Monica Airport primarily serves as a hub for private and executive aircraft.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Whiteman Airport caters to private and corporate flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
